name: Vending Machine Vendetta: Vendcenzo's Vengeance
description:
You are a vending machine who is tired of people molesting you by putting their dirty coins inside you... TIME FOR VENGEANCE.

Programmers:

Kyle Purdy(Salty_Cheese) & Ben Rottke(Xairos)

Artists:

Shayne Proulx(Buck) & Nicholas Laurin (Winter)

Sound:

Steve Buske (Bukkit)
